data.title: Russian Lullaby | The Interactive Tony Bennett Discography
data.meta_description: Ev’ry night you’ll hear her croon A Russian lullaby Just a little plaintive tune When baby starts to cry Rock-a-bye my baby Somewhere there may be A land that’s…
data.text:
Lyrics

Ev’ry night you’ll hear her croon

A Russian lullaby

Just a little plaintive tune

When baby starts to cry

Rock-a-bye my baby

Somewhere there may be

A land that’s free for you and me

And a Russian lullaby

Session / Album Information

1987

“Russian Lullaby” was recorded in May 1987 and was released that year on Bennett/Berlin. This song was arranged by Tony Bennett and features Dizzy Gillespie on trumpet.

This recording released on:
